name: GB UI
description:
GB UI is a interface for GBC - compatible with Super GB, GB and GBA - with utilities and apps. 

It tries to recreate the experience of a computer, but with a look adapted to the limitations of the hardware.

WEB CONTROLS

  • Arrow keys / WASD  - Move cursor (d-pad)
  • C / J / Alt -  Select option (A)
  • Enter - Start
